title: Assessing and Treating Alcohol Withdrawal
itunes:title: Assessing and Treating Alcohol Withdrawal
description:
This episode discusses alcohol withdrawal symptoms and consequences, including delirium tremens, management of alcohol withdrawal, and when to use symptom-triggered therapy or fixed-dose regimens. 

Faculty: Joji Suzuki, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D., Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 1 CME: What Clinicians Need to Know About Alcohol Use Disorder
  • Consequences of Alcohol Use Disorder: Withdrawal
